step01.title: Select a plant
step01.subtitle: You can search our full plant library, pick from the popular list, or scan a plant using your camera. You can also skip this step, but selecting a plant lets us automatically suggest care tasks like watering for you.

scannerModal.title: Scan Plant
scannerModal.scanInstructions: Take a photo or choose one from your gallery. Please use a clear, good-quality image that shows the plant's leaf shape well, centered and not blocked by other plants or objects.
scannerModal.cameraPermissionMessage: Please grant camera and media permissions to take a photo.
scannerModal.libraryPermissionMessage: Please grant media permissions to pick a photo.
scannerModal.noResults: No results returned. Try a clearer photo.
